creditline: Gift of George and Caroline Wanstall
description: holiday greeting card with tipped-in photograph on inner left-hand page; black and white photo on white paper with deckle edge of surface of water with plants growing beneath--some plant stems and leaves protruding from water especially at top at LLC; greeting card printed in green, red and black on cream colored paper; front of card has black rectangular image of red flowers on a black branch; interior of card on right-hand page hand-written and printed: [12.2008 / Dear Caroline, / Season's Greetings / A Happy New Year / 2009 / Our Best Wishes for a peace (sic) and prosperous New Year. / Machiko & Koichiro Kurita]
dimension:
6 1/8 × 4 11/16 in. (15.56 × 11.91 cm) (image, sheet)
8 11/16 × 11 in. (22.07 × 27.94 cm) (mount, greeting card, open)
title: Holiday greeting card with photograph
